title: Giro d’Italia Stage 12: Olav Kooij Wins after Wout van Aert Rolls Out Red Carpet in Bunch Sprint
content:
After a few misses, Dutch sprinter ace Olav Kooij blasts to victory after perfect leadout from Wout van Aert. Isaac del Toro widens lead with time bonuses in a relatively quiet day at the Giro d'Italia.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Stage 12: Olav Kooij Wins after Wout van Aert Rolls Out Red Carpet in Bunch Sprint on Velo.
author: ahood
